titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate maximum-age entry requirements for Federal law enforcement officers and firefighters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Repeals provisions which authorize: (1) Federal agency heads to determine maximum-age entry requirements for Federal law enforcement officers and fire fighters; and (2) the Secretary of the Interior to determine maximum-age entry requirements for appointments to the United States Park Police.
